actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to apply duty-free treatment with respect to articles exported for purposes of rendering certain geophysical or contracting services abroad and returned.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to make duty-free the rendering of geophysical or contracting services in connection with the exploration or extraction of natural resources.

titles.title: A bill to apply duty-free treatment with respect to articles exported for purposes of rendering certain geophysical or contracting services abroad and returned.
